animals_header_text:
Responds with a picture.
You can specify a number of pictures by writing `bomb` `number` after a command. (e.g. `!cat bomb 2`)
avatar: Responds with your avatar, unless a username is specified
champgg_setup: Please setup `CHAMPIONGG_KEY` in config.js to use the **`!lol`** command.
channelinfo: Gives information about this channel, unless a channelname is specified
chat_setup: Please setup `CLEVERBOT_KEY` in config.js to use the **`!chat`** command.
chat_usage: Please setup cleverbot in config.js to use the **`!chat`** command.
comics: Get a random comic from a bunch of different artists
comics_asp: Returns a Amazing Super Powers comic
comics_cah: Returns a Cyanide and Happimess comic
comics_dhd: Returns a Dog House Diaries comic
comics_smbc: Returns a Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal comic
ddg: Search the web, can also calculate and convert. Search other websites by appending its shortening (e.g. `!ddg !yt Hello`) See <https://duckduckgo.com/bang> for a list
define: Gives a definition for the word
define_error: I couldn't find a definition for
dota2_best: Get the top 10 Heroes for a specific position
dota2_build: Get the most popular build for a Hero
dota2_counters: Get the top 10 counters for a Hero
dota2_header_text:
Dota 2 help commands.
Accepted positions are #{dota_positions}.
dota2_impact: Get the top 10 Heroes with the biggest impact
dota2_items: Get the top 10 most used items for a Hero
drama: Responds with a drama image, if no number is written, a random one
emoji: Responds with an emoji copypasta, if no number is written, a random one
feedback: Give feedback and report bugs about the bot
feedback_reply: Thanks! Your feedback has been received.
feedback_setup: Please setup `FEEDBACK_CHANNEL_ID` in config.js to use the **`!feedback`** command.
gif: Gets a gif from Giphy or Popkey matching the given tags. Use `!giphy` or `!popkey` to search the specific site
gif_error: I couldn't find a gif for
help_all: List all available commands in private chat
help_memelist: List of meme names for the **`!meme`** command
join: Shows a link that can be used to invite the bot to your server
join_link:
To invite me to your server, click the link below and select a server.
Only users with **Manage Server** permission in that server are able to invite me to it.
You may remove some of the permissions if you wish, but be warned it may break current and upcoming features.
join_setup: Please setup `CLIENT_ID` in config.js to use the **`!join`** command.
lol_bans: Get the top 10 most common bans
lol_best: Get the top 10 best Champions for a Position
lol_counters: Get the top 10 counters for a Champion and Position
lol_header_text:
League of Legends help commands.
Accepted Positions are #{lol_positions}.
Accepted regions are #{lol_regions}.
lol_items: Get the highest win item sets for a Champion and Position
lol_match: Get the name, rank, Champion, winrate and total games for all players of a __current__ match
lol_skills: Get the highest win skills for a Champion and Position
lol_status: Get the LoL Game and Client server status for all regions
meme: Creates a meme with the given meme name and text
meme_setup: Please setup `IMGFLIP_USERNAME` and `IMGFLIP_PASSWORD` in config.js to use the **`!meme`** command.
meme_usage:
Usage: **`!meme`** `meme name` `"top text"` `"bottom text"`
Write **`!memelist`** for a list of meme names
memelist: List of meme names for the **`!meme`** command
music_not_connected: Not connected to a voice channel.
music_not_found: Channel not found. Please write the exact name of the voice channel or join it.
music_queue_added: has been added to the queue.
music_queue_empty: No more songs in the queue.
next: Shows the song that will play next
no_item_sets: I don't have item sets for
no_skills: I don't have skill orders for
ow_eliminations: Heroes with the most eliminations per life
ow_header_text:
Information and player stats for Overwatch.
Accepted regions are #{ow_regions}.
Specifying region is optional but the request will take a second or two longer.
ow_kill_streak: Heroes with the highest kill streak
ow_objective_kills: Heroes with the most objective kills
ow_win_percent: Heroes with the highest win percentage
paste: Creates a paste on Pastebin and returns the url
pastebin_setup: Please setup `PASTEBIN_KEY` in config.js to use the **`!paste`** command.
popkey_setup: Please setup `POPKEY_KEY` in config.js to use the **`!popkey`** command.
quote: Responds with a quote, if no number is written, a random one
random: Generate truly random numbers and strings
random_fraction: Generate a number of random real numbers between 0 and 1 with set decimal places, write **replace** at the end to disable duplicates (e.g. __!fraction 1 5 replace__)
random_gaussian: Generate a number of random numbers from a Gaussian distribution (e.g. __!gaussian 1 50 10 5__)
random_integer: Generate a number of random integers between min and max, write **replace** at the end to disable duplicates (e.g. __!integer 2 1 50 replace__)
random_setup: Please setup `RANDOM_KEY` in config.js to use the **`!random`** command.
random_string: Generate a number of random strings of a given length, can also input your own charset (default is the alphabet), as well as write **replace** at the end to disable duplicates (e.g. __!string 1 10 abc123 replace__)
request: Request a song to be played
request_error: Invalid or not supported Youtube URL. Please make sure the Youtube URL starts with `http` or `https`.
riot_setup: Please setup `RIOT_KEY` in config.js to use the **`!lol`** command.
robohash_header_text:
Responds with an image according to your ID.
You can specify a suffix after a command to get a different picture. (e.g. `!robot Testie`)
roll: Rolls the dice a number of times with a number of sides, see **`!random`** for advanced generators
serverinfo: Gives information about this server, unless a servername is specified
serverlist: Lists all the servers the bot is connected to
servers: Lists how many servers, channels and users the bot is connected to
set-language: Set all help text to respond in a specified language
specify_summoner: You need to specify a summoner name.
stop: Stops the playback, leaves the channel and deletes all songs from the queue
synonyms_error: I couldn't find a synonym for
uptime: Shows how long the bot has been online
urban: Returns the summary of the first matching search result from Urban Dictionary
urban_error: I couldn't find a definition for
userinfo: Gives information about this user, unless a username is specified
version: Get information on the latest version of Gravebot
videocall: Start a one click video call or screenshare directly on Appear.in. Mention users to make it private
vjoin: Joins the voice channel the user is in, unless a channel name is specified
wiki: Returns the summary of the first matching search result from Wikipedia
wiki_error: I couldn't find an article for
wolfram: Query Wolfram Alpha for almost anything
wolfram_setup: Please setup `WOLFRAM_KEY` in config.js to use the **`!wolfram`** command.
youtube: Gets a video from Youtube matching the given tags
youtube_error: I couldn't find a video for
youtube_setup: Please setup `YOUTUBE_KEY` in config.js to use the **`!youtube`** command.
